summary: This document is an internal FBI email chain from December 3, 2019, discussing a media inquiry from a Norwegian journalist. The journalist, Runa Fjellanger, asks about reports that the FBI is interested in speaking with a Norwegian citizen (name redacted) and Crown Princess Mette-Marit in connection with the Jeffrey Epstein case. FBI personnel internally clarify they are unaware of any current interest in Norway but note they would be interested in any pertinent information.

persons.name: Runa Fjellanger
persons.context: Norwegian journalist from VG newspaper who emailed the FBI National Press Office to inquire about reports that the FBI wants to speak with a Norwegian citizen and Crown Princess Mette-Marit regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Central figure in the FBI's investigation; the media inquiry is about the FBI's interest in his connections to Norwegian individuals.

persons.name: Crown Princess Mette-Marit
persons.context: Mentioned in the media inquiry as someone an anonymous FBI agent allegedly claimed the FBI is interested in speaking with regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

connections.description: Media inquiry references an anonymous FBI agent claim that the FBI wants to speak with Crown Princess Mette-Marit regarding Epstein, suggesting a potential connection under investigation.

events.title: Media inquiry about FBI interest in Norwegian connections to Epstein
events.description: Norwegian journalist Runa Fjellanger contacts the FBI National Press Office to ask about reports that the FBI wants to speak with a Norwegian citizen and Crown Princess Mette-Marit regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A Norwegian journalist inquired about reports that an anonymous FBI agent at the American embassy in Stockholm claimed the FBI wanted to speak with Crown Princess Mette-Marit and another Norwegian citizen regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
The FBI internally stated they were unaware of any current interest in Norway but would be interested in any pertinent information regarding the case.
The inquiry references flight logs indicating the unnamed Norwegian citizen traveled on Epstein's private jet several times.
The email chain shows the FBI's National Press Office and New York field office coordinating a response to international media inquiries about the Epstein investigation.
